website_summaries.verdict: One of the best choices for global pendant lights for that unique industrial look in any room. Provides a great natural style and illumination.
pros: A distinctive industrial style that is simple but elegant
Easy to access the light bulb to replace or upgrade when necessary
cons: Included lightbulb is a little underwhelming and underpowered

customer_reviews.title: This pedants look amazing! Works perfectly well with LED Edison dimmable bulbs
customer_reviews.text: This pedants look amazing! Works perfectly well with LED Edison dimmable bulbs. I used it together with Linea di Liara Effimero Five-Light Stem Hung Chandelier, that creates perfect look for the kitchen-dining area. I've got many compliments, everybody likes it :)
customer_reviews.author: zaz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very modern looking. I like them but the cord hanging from the ceiling is not exactly straight which detracts from the clean look a bit (UPDATE: the cord has straightened over time. See picture for an idea of how it looks now). I personally prefer another light (Linea di Liara Lucera Industrial Factory Stem Hung Pendant Lamp - Antique Brass One-Light Fixture with Glass Shade - Metal Canopy - Downlight Modern Vintage LL-P431-AB) because the lines look cleaner and also the shape of the glass looks very nice. Both are great purchases and I recommend both but I prefer this one linked here...
customer_reviews.author: MommaCX3 ☀️❤️

customer_reviews.title: You get way more than what you pay for! Update your look on a budget!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more pleased with these! They look high end with a super affordable price tag. We bought a home that needed all lighting replaced so this budget friendly option worked out perfectly. I looked at more expensive real brass options that were just way too high at the moment. These lights look amazing and no one is getting up close and personal with them to check if they are real brass or painted. I love them and have received so many compliments. The cords do straighten out from the weight of the bulb after a day or so. Very pleased and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Howorth

customer_reviews.title: Just hung 2 of them above my kitchen island and they are a beautiful accent. I purchased the Thomas Edison lights as ...
customer_reviews.text: These lights are very simple but elegant. Just hung 2 of them above my kitchen island and they are a beautiful accent. I purchased the Thomas Edison lights as shown to complete the look. I was skeptical about the cable, thought it would look crooked, but to my delight, I was able to make them straight. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: These are the perfect lights
customer_reviews.text: These are the PERFECT CHIC and subtle detail to my kitchen!! I love that they are unique and have their own subtle beauty without being front attention grabber. Paired with some Edison lights, these pendant lights are gorgeous. They look EXACTLY like the picture. They don't come with the cord covering, so the cord is black, but I prefer it like that. Matched the black fixtures throughout my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Dallin & Heather

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is great.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, love this pendant light. It’s exactly what I wanted for my mid century dining room area. There was a little flaw in the glass dome but it didn’t bother me enough to get a replacement. We ordered 3 more for the hallway and entryway so they will all match. The cord is adjustable so you can make it longer or shorter. The cord isn’t 100% straight but I’m a perfectionist and it doesn’t bother me. Our previous light had 6 bulbs so this does make it seem darker in here but I think that’s just because I’m used to it brighter. We got the bulb at Lowe’s.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Motschenbacher

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LIGHTS!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. I purchased 3 for my kitchen. The install only took 25 minutes. I still need to purchase some Edison bulbs but i am loving the look of these lights. Great price for the quality. I would recommend anyone to buy these! Quick shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Rude

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lights. Receive compliments every time someone sees them
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lights. Receive compliments every time someone sees them. Only negative is that the cord is fabric. Other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful for a modern industrial farmhouse!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and exactly as expected. I purchased 3 of these single pendants to hang over our kitchen island and my husband had no trouble installing them to our panel ceiling. The glass is extremely thin (about the thickness of a standard wine glass), so must be very careful when cleaning. Love how it looks in our modern industrial farmhouse themed kitchen. We also purchased the Linea di Liara Andante LED Industrial 2 Light Wall Sconce (in black with antique brass) and they pair nicely. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Janel

customer_reviews.title: Nice light
customer_reviews.text: Three stars because the light had missing hardware and the manufacturer refused to send new hardware stating that they can only replace missing items if bought from an authorized dealer. I was unable to contact seller. Other than the issue of hardware, this light is beautiful and fits my space very well.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: First light I’ve installed by myself, and the instructions recommended it be installed by a professional and left no wiring connection instructions. Thankfully Google can give you answers to most anything, and I got this up not problem. I did have to cut off about 5 feet of cord, which seemed pretty excessive (not sure who’d ever need a light to hang down that much). All and all I love it! Looks great and if I can install it, anyone can!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hahn

customer_reviews.title: so i was more than happy when i found these
customer_reviews.text: I saw what could be the exact same lamp at restoration hardware for 3 times the price. i couldn't afford them then, so i was more than happy when i found these. i bought 2 of them for the guest bathroom remodeling. i hung them at different lengths and they look amazing. i got all sorts of compliments. i definitely recommend you use the Edison bulb with them as it gives them a cozy look. they were undoubtedly a great buy
customer_reviews.author: andrea pena

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. There’s a site I love, Room & Board with highest quality made in America , furnishings and accessories- check it out . Anyway, they have this same look in a pendant for $450. I love mixing inexpensive items like this , with more expensive ( but still good value ) items where needed.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: This did not turn out the way I expected. I was so excited about it but when it came it it looked cheaply made. The wire part looked like it was made out of a bungee cord. We sent it back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and good quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 3 of these fixtures for our kitchen island and really like them. The reason for 4 stars is that the glass is thin, gets dirty quick, and does not seem very even on the larger opening where you would insert the bulb. But overall we are happing. However I need to forewarn you about the selller of this product on Amazon, when we ordered 3 sets, only 2 were correct but the third one was a different part number altogether. It too them 4 tries to finally get it right.
customer_reviews.author: Massoud Vaziri

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These lights are horrible!! One of the three that we bought burns out every bulb we put in it!! The sockets are crooked, so your bulbs look off. The cords never straightened out. The glass globes appear to hang unevenly. I wish we would have returned these after we saw how bad they were. Do yourself a favor and keep looking. These are very poor quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Louanne

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these pendants!
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged great! Always worried about glass being shipped. Clean, classic and timeless design. Great inexpensive kitchen update. *you will need to shape/straighten the black cording by hand. Not big deal. I’m using clear Edison bulbs in mine. Great update!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dean

customer_reviews.title: I love these pendants
customer_reviews.text: I love these pendants! We used these to replace the ones we already had in our kitchen over the island. Used them with some Edison bulbs like the ones pictured. They are so pretty and I love the brass and matte black. One thing that isn't ideal about the pendants is that the wires haven't completely straightened out yet, but I can live with that. Would recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall this is a nice product, but wish I could have gotten a ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a nice product, but wish I could have gotten a personal preview. I'll keep it but I really don't care for the long black cord which stands out against my white ceiling. My previous pendants had white or silver cords which didn't seem as stark... I also should have gotten the Milk Glass globe for a softer lighting effect... Is it possible to buy a replacement globe? I've been searching without success.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Artist

customer_reviews.title: Antique brass colors vary greatly
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights, have had them installed for several weeks on both sides of our king bed, and just realized the brass is two different colors despite there being only one antique brass to choose from! I am not happy about this as it’s yet another thing to do in a long list to be fully complete with our remodel. I expect a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Harter

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Bought for above our dining table, as we were wanting something simple. Item shipped to us in Hawaii and came packaged securely, nothing damaged. My husband did switch out the bulb that it comes with for something brighter just to suite our taste but it’s great that this comes with a bulb already included.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED - cheaper than Resto but all the same look!
customer_reviews.text: The Restoration Hardwa ones are like $160 a piece and these are 1/3 the price with the same look - got just what I wanted. The cord straightened out just fine and they look amazing...seriously. The bulb is really modern looking. I bought the black one to go with a Scandinavian décor look and marble counters.
customer_reviews.author: madehak

customer_reviews.title: Very good looking and good value!
customer_reviews.text: These look great! Very nice looking in our hallway with only a few inches of cord showing. We did a dry run in a location with more of a chandelier length needed and it looked great there too. We looked at the home improvement stores and scoured the internet for something in this color and basic shape. Everything was either not quite right or $$$. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J. Villeneuve

customer_reviews.title: Lovely globes, wire doesn't pull straight, looks uncurled when hung
customer_reviews.text: overall I was satisfied with these lights and for the price as well. My only disapprove was that the cord that it hangs from is a black fabric like nylon material (not plastic) and it isn't pulled down straight, it looks like someone tied it around something for a long time and won't uncurl. The globes themselves however look lovely.
customer_reviews.author: DK7

customer_reviews.title: Elegant. Simple. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Elegant fixture with nice quality hardware. The Braided cable is a nice touch. I fitted mine with a round edison style bulb and a dimmer switch. Looks great, no complaints. Installs simply like most fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Mako

customer_reviews.title: Hardware good. Glass globe bad.
customer_reviews.text: The hardware itself was beautiful but the globes all had at least one very noticeable bubble. I bought two and replaced them with another two which all had bubbles...couldn’t use them unfortunately. Had to return all four.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: ... that came with our home & this does not disappoint. It was fairly easy to install - I ...
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for a more subtle option to replace the gaudy orange pendant that came with our home & this does not disappoint. It was fairly easy to install - I trimmed the cord as I only needed about 18 inches &, in all, it only took about 20 minutes from start to finish. The cord is still a bit crooked, but it has straightened quite a bit already, so I'm sure it will get straighter with time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lights just didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the look of these pendants. The black wire with antique bronze and oil rubbed bronze were the perfect combination. However we didn't keep them. The height they looked best at was also the height my husband's eye level. He said he felt like he was looking into the sun. I tried bulb after bulb hoping I could keep these lovelies. In the end we had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: puzzled91

customer_reviews.title: Makes the room pop
customer_reviews.text: Great lights and add good character to our newly remodeled kitchen. Nice size with plenty of cord to adjust length. After adding the Edison bulbs, the kitchen came to life. Love the brass finishes and are high quality. Better than what we could find at any of the retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: Cridertown

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall ceilings!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great find for the price, and the quality is good! Worked perfectly for our tall ceilings. They were packaged well, and the electricians didn’t seem to have an issue installing them.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew N.

customer_reviews.title: Bought three to match a new dining room light with ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought three to match a new dining room light with antique bulbs. Very hard to get these clean. Still haven't figured out a way or product to clean them
customer_reviews.author: Candilocks

customer_reviews.title: simple and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Loved this so much. We bought a home from the 90’s and the light fixtures to match. Needed a serious update on a budget. This is so beautiful and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Mica Tesh

customer_reviews.title: Painted the black cord
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged so nothing broke. Looks nice and was easy to put up! I painted the black cord cream. It fits our room better.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great light fixtures!
customer_reviews.text: These light fixtures look great in our kitchen. I was a bit hesitant that they wouldn't be nice because of the low price, but they look great and we get many complements on them.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Moody

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in two days, looks exactly like the pictures. I really like them, and for the price...they cannot be beat. I put two over my island to replace some ugly old pendants the previous owners had up. They put a little pizzaz into my kitchen! **in the middle of painting ceilings. Will update with better photo**
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Classic light pendants
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pendant lights! Hung three over my kitchen island and they are perfect- clean and classic . The price is fabulous and it definitely looks more high end. I had no issue with the black cord , it just needed to be straightened out by pulling it a little and after it hung a day it was perfect. Highly recommend these light fuxtures
customer_reviews.author: IMA10

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty
customer_reviews.text: Sadly we had to return because it didn’t work for us. It was beautiful. I wish we could have used it in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light fixture. Looks high end for a great price. Found a very similar looking fixture at West Elm for 4x the price. Perfect shape and size!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good size, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, but too big for my space. Best for bigger kitchens. Like the look and good quality. (Gold didn’t match mine)
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Good

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Great for price and easy to install but my wife did not like look for her new kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Castellano

customer_reviews.title: Nice, not exactly as advertised, but it works
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice light, but it isn’t as described in the photo which I would have preferred. Still,, it’s a nice adjustable length light fixture and if you are handy with electricity it’s easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: L.E. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Globe is a beauty.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. They are perfect for my small guest bathroom. Globe is big enough for a small place. I got two. Well made. Classy look.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Fusaro

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough how THRILLED I am with these lights! We’re renovating our basement bar and these lights are absolutely perfect, just what I was looking for! They’re elegant, bright, and the perfect size. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon H

customer_reviews.title: which was nice, but was too much light for the space
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this light to go over the dining table to replace a little chandelier, which was nice, but was too much light for the space. With the old-time light bulb, this is just right. We can work on a computer at the table or have a romantic meal and it works for both. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nermul shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pendents
customer_reviews.text: The order arrived on time. The electrician installed it with out complaint or problem. These lights were purchased for a new house build. After shopping several lighting stores this product was not only the most astetic but well within budget. I had to shop around for my favorite light bulb (they are not included). The top of this light/base was attached at the top of a 14 foot ceiling but still had enough extension to hang down in a reasonable mannor. The cords continue to straighten out. I think these pieces might be one of the most beautiful parts of the house. So far....extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mikla

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hang and adjust the hanging length
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and pictured. Kinda light weight. The three I purchased and hung as soon as they arrived (months ago) have not straightened yet (wires look crooked). Easy to hang and adjust the hanging length. Arrived intact. Well packed.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Great RH knockoff!
customer_reviews.text: We put these in our guest bathroom over the vanity. They look great! We get a ton of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I spent a lot of time hunting for the perfect pendant lights in stores
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time hunting for the perfect pendant lights in stores. I finally decided to check Amazon on a whim and found these lights. They are gorgeous- exactly what I've been in search of for my newly renovated kitchen. They look amazing with Edison bulbs. Very happy with my purchase and would absolutely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of them
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. Love the look of them. The cord on one of them just won't straighten up, so I took off one star. Beautiful, bit one flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Stylish decor
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Replaced the existing fixtures that came with the house when I bought it. It makes my basement living area look so much more chic and stylish, and makes me excited to finish decorating!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!!! Came in great condition!! It’s absolutely lovely, very well made!!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable industrial farmhouse light
customer_reviews.text: Bought for both of my bathrooms and they look great. Very industrial farmhouse feel.
customer_reviews.author: Evan K.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality , crooked bulb, uneven glass.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with both the glass bulb and the socket being crooked. Glass bulb will not sit on an even surface without rocking and has deformities in the glass, and socket holds bulb about 10 degrees off. Will be returning and purchasing from a local hardware store instead.
customer_reviews.author: Krilliad

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful if it wasn't for the plastic screws
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lights but the screw which controls how far down the lights hang, is made of plastic and strips really easy. If I pull even very gently, more cord comes out and the light is too long.
customer_reviews.author: Gwink

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kitchen😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best item that I got from Amazon. Looks great!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly50

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: We love how it looks in our new kitchen.... From the contractors to everyone who's seen it said it was a great choice! We also went with the Edison bulbs as recommended and didn't regret that either.
customer_reviews.author: YL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These look amazing in my bedroom. I ended up cutting the cord shorter as I liked the look higher. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Eric Erdmann

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Bought two and one was shattered but got a replacement quick and they paid for shipping. Wife loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Dac

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Pendant Light Fixtures
customer_reviews.text: Nice, elegant design and feel. It added a stylish touch above my kitchen island. The only downside I would mention is keeping the inside of the glass clean. Dirt and dist easily get trapped all around the sides of the interior and thus poses an issue when trying to maintiain cleanliness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy these pendant lights!
customer_reviews.text: These pendants lights are exactly what I was looking for! Simple, beautiful lines, simple to install, and a great value for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: cDub

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Glass is clear
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Glass is clear . True to picture. As good as lights costing three times as much. I recommend this lamp. Adjustable cord, you can had a plug in plug.
customer_reviews.author: Jule R

customer_reviews.title: These fixtures are beautiful! All parts came in tact
customer_reviews.text: These fixtures are beautiful! All parts came in tact. Glass globe is quality. And chrome is beautiful. I haven't hung them yet because we are still under construction but I see that they will be perfect over my 8' island.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are simple and beautiful. I thought
customer_reviews.text: These are simple and beautiful. I thought, at first, that the glass globes were crooked. I took into account that the cord may still be kinked up but that didn't end up being the problem. The Edison bulbs were what was messing it all up. We ordered the recommended Hudson bulbs and 2 of the 4 were perfect. The other 2 were tinted brown and one of them was wonky. I'll contact them for a refund but nothing about these lights disappointed. Very pretty and everyone loves them! Especially me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap way to update your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: These are so much more modern than my previous pendant lights. They change the whole feel of my kitchen. I had an electrician install. It took 1.5 hrs for all three to be installed.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful & retro
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful & retro. Bought with a vintage edison bulb 40 & 60 watts for both pendants I bought & looks beautiful. The filament bulbs cast a reflection on the glass itself so looks so interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Nsassy

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like picture!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light and came packaged very well. Also fast shipping! We are very happy!
customer_reviews.author: SandraB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hanging kitchen light
customer_reviews.text: This hanging globe was perfect for over the kitchen sink. Exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: C.Ockerse

customer_reviews.title: Rope like
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize the part holding the light is rope like not a black rod but they look good hanging!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful and add a refreshed and updated look
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for lights for about a year and couldn’t find anything. Went onto Amazon and found these. They are beautiful and add a refreshed and updated look. They came well packaged and installed with no issues. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Marg.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these. They have a beautiful black woven pendent ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. They have a beautiful black woven pendent cord. Not like the plastic cords you get with other cheaper pendants. The glass globes look very high end. I tried to get sconces and a light fixture to match I loved these so much. Everyone who visits comments on these pendants. They make a statement!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lamastere

customer_reviews.title: Black cord
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The only reason why it's not 5 start it because the black hanging cord is not completely straight. We are hoping the gravity does it's thing and straightens it out
customer_reviews.author: Brijesh patel

customer_reviews.title: Installation is difficult
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to install... the size of the screws for the mounting was wrong. I had to go to Home Depot to get the right ones. Few months after installation, I broke the ball by mistake and the vendor never responded to my inquiry if they would have the replacement ball available again...
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Not just for the kitchen!!  Love these
customer_reviews.text: I had these installed in my newly remodeled master bath above each medicine cabinet and they look amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Simple and elegant, easy to install after I converted a recessed light. I didn’t like the black cord, so I painted it gray to blend in better.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Sill looks nice and a good price
customer_reviews.text: It hangs a little tilted after installed. Maybe applying a weight of some kind may level it out. Sill looks nice and a good price, compared with stores.
customer_reviews.author: tania

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these lights for my daughter's house and they look great! Everyone say's how awesome they look.
customer_reviews.author: gatorchic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Product
customer_reviews.text: These lights are very pretty. Well made, durable and look phenomenal in the kitchen. Highly recommend. The bowl is large enough to make a statement in the room, but not overpowering. Love love love love.
customer_reviews.author: rw

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, good value
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, all required parts included, good value. Only complaint is that the glass is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: MosesStick

customer_reviews.title: Returning - stuck with this
customer_reviews.text: does not look like the pic at all!! cant even return they say return date has expired.
customer_reviews.author: Smile

customer_reviews.title: Perfect look. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. So pretty. Straightforward to install. The cords were a little bent when first installed, but after some small adjustments and time, they straighten out!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and love them. I didn't need it but there was plenty of cord for any height ceiling. With the vintage bulb (not included) they give a warm glow to my kitchen island.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pick
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look and price was very reasonable. Ended up installing 5 of these!
customer_reviews.author: Vince G.

customer_reviews.title: very nice and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: very nice and easy to install, but a little glaring for the bathroom with the mirror reflection and using the Edison bulbs made it too yellow
customer_reviews.author: Ava L.

customer_reviews.title: ... bought two for above our kitchen island and we love them! We bought the LED Edison bulbs which ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought two for above our kitchen island and we love them! We bought the LED Edison bulbs which are perfect. I really enjoy that the light spreads throughout the room as opposed to a spotlight below.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my kitchen. I love the simplistic yet stylish design. I get so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item, just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great item, just as expected. Everything was well protected and shipped fast. Loving the new look of my my kitchen. The hanging cords are cloth which I was already aware of reading another review but they are not cheap looking at all and everything seems to look well built with good quality.
customer_reviews.author: adriana quintero

customer_reviews.title: Love the lights
customer_reviews.text: Love the lights. Great quality for an amazing price. I was looking at pottery barn (which I had before) but decided to give these a try for the price. Not disappointed at all. Great product! Only issue was removing the glue of the sticker which was a pain but really a minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. Good quality for a great price. Look beautiful installed in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin S.

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like this light fixture! I can't wait to renovate our bathroom and install it. It is a lovely, matte black and the goldish accent is great. Packaged really well.
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: Best hanging lights out there .
customer_reviews.text: These lights are the best bang for your dollar. First off they came packaged very well. Second everything is included for install. They are LED and dim perfectly with the lutron CL. Dimmer. I have a total of 5 of these. 3 hanging over my island and 2 in the bathroom
customer_reviews.author: bryan j.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks great in our kitchen! easy to install and looks very expensive and modern
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette & Alex Caro

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great quality light. Customer service was very good when I wanted to buy a separate glass shade for it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Blatt

customer_reviews.title: Looks great leave extra time for install
customer_reviews.text: The light looks great, but the fabric covered cord is not easy to manipulate for installation. Installation time was double what it shoood have been but once the light was hung it looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this light! Very easy to install and came well packaged. We used it at the bottom of a stairwell and might get more for around the house. Been up two days and cord seems to be straightening out no problem. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: shayne lee james

customer_reviews.title: As good as more expensive versions
customer_reviews.text: These look way more expensive than are. Given the price, I was worried they'd look cheap, but they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Jones

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended these. They are the best
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended these . They are the best . My husband and I love them so much for out kitchen !! Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but is hard to clean the inside of the glass
customer_reviews.text: It looks dusty all the time because is very hard to clean the inside of the glass i will have to change them im the future
customer_reviews.author: Joffre Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fixtures. Initially found similar fixtures at pottery barn ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fixtures. Initially found similar fixtures at pottery barn for $120 and came to Amazon to see if I could find a similar alternative and not did I. These are just as gorgeous as we intended and provide a lot of light to an area previously dim.
customer_reviews.author: Kymberly Wehrle

customer_reviews.title: Great pendant lights
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light - looks good with squirrel cage bulb (not included) better than it looks online.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Denee Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice but...
customer_reviews.text: Lights are beautiful but be aware that if you install more than one it will create a shadow in the form of a line in the ceiling. We have a dimer so we don't turn them completely on to avoid the line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Primo Large Glass Globe Pendant Light Fixture - Black and Gold Hanging Pendant Lighting for Kitchen Island - Mid Century Modern Ceiling Light with Clear Glass Shade
feature_bullets: PENDANTS PERFECT FOR YOUR SPACE - The Antique Brass Primo pendant light is ideal for a variety of spaces, from farmhouse pendant lighting for kitchens to pendant lights for bathrooms. It's great in dining rooms, bars, kitchen counters, over sinks and in bedrooms. This pendant light works with industrial, modern and transitional designs.

FITS YOUR CEILINGS - Comes with an adjustable fabric covered cord that works with ceiling heights from 7' to 14', and has a swivel to accomodate sloped ceilings. Install a single pendant over a sink, or in groups of 3 or 5 pendants above a kitchen island.

SAFE AND EASY TO INSTALL - UL listed (damp locations) for your safety. Easy to assemble and bulb can be replaced without disassembly. Supported by an American company with Chicago based customer service.

DIMMABLE AND WORKS WITH MOST BULBS - Fully dimmable when used with a dimmable bulb and compatible dimmer switch. Uses medium base bulbs including LED, CFL, Halogen and Edison bulbs, compatible with most smart bulbs
DESIGNED IN CHICAGO - Linea di Liara has been developing high quality, affordable lighing in Chicago for generations. Premium lighting designed with you in mind.
